properties.property: [Character [Enemy Kyla] Upward True [Sequence [[FadeOutSong 2000] [Wait 120] [PlaySong 2000 0 0.5 0 [Field Unfolding]] [Wait 180] [Dialog "What is freedom...?"] [Dialog "It must be the death of purpose..."] [Face [CharacterTarget [Enemy Kyla]] Leftward] [Dialog "I was born a servent of a servent... My master is cruel, but unlike the world, her cruelty is predictable. It is something to which I am accustomed."] [Dialog "It is the chaos beyond these castle walls that I could not bear..."] [Face [CharacterTarget [Enemy Kyla]] Downward] [Dialog "But why does every day get worse? Why must I be humiliated at every opportunity? The fortunes of other servents rise, but I am kept at the bottom..."] [Dialog "Nothing I do goes uncriticized... She may be my master, but she herself serves under the Queen."] [Dialog "She is cruel not because she doesn't understand what it is like... she is cruel because she understands exactly..."] [Face [CharacterTarget [Enemy Kyla]] Upward] [Dialog "They all do..."] [FadeOutSong 2000] [Wait 120] [ReplaceAdvent [KylaAdvent 0] [KylaAdvent 1]] [PlaySong 2000 0 0.5 0 [Castle CastlePart1]] [PlaySound 0.5 [Field ChestOpen]] [Dialog "Something unlatched..."]]] [[KylaAdvent 0]]]
